showroom.address: Persiaran Sentral, Gerbang Nusajaya 79200 Iskandar Purteri Johor, Malaysia
showroom.operating_hours: Daily Operating Hours (including Public Holiday) Monday to Sunday​ 10am – 6pm

description: Spoiled with dreamy views from elevated grounds, Senadi Hills is a private residential enclave that welcomes elders and the less-abled with wheelchair-friendly spaces. Beautiful manicured gardens and parks enrich Senadi Hills with natural touches of nature and greenery. Phase 2A offers a limited number of units with a lot size of 22’ x 70’ and a built-up area of 2,197 sq. ft. These tastefully designed and guarded homes ensure ample space for your whole family comfortably. They are an excellent match for all generations, making this suitable for multigenerational families. Its strategic location also boasts a wealth of amenities within and beyond its bounds - from schools, shopping centres to medical facilities and many more to fulfill your daily needs. Phase 1A has sold out! Hurry up to register now!
